review: does everything I expected it to do
author: Mike

review: Other than not being able to get one of the apps working, I love it! It's easy to use and there are many viewing options to choose from. GreAt purchase.
author: DeeZ

review: I love the fire stick and it was super easy to hook up which is a big plus!!
author: Stacey Miller

review: Thank You - It is a great addition to my TV Veiwing
author: Louis Jones "lojlardy"

review: Worked out of the box, easy to set up, runs a bit hot though.
author: David Corcoran

review: I honestly thought that being a prime member that getting a fire stick would be the natural thing to do. Considering how much I pay for a prime membership, you would think that the movies and tv shows would be free. But I was dead wrong. I don't really understand why people were so hot for this item. You can get the same movies and TV shows through Hulu or Netflix. For what the fire stick has to offer I can just keep using my Apple TV or Xbox one.
author: Quita Edwards
